title: Goa nightclub fire: How the Luthra brothers were nabbed - a timeline
description: Goa nightclub co-owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra have been detained in Phuket, Thailand, and are being deported to India for investigation into a deadly fire that killed 25 people. Indian authorities coordinated the operation after the brothers fled the country shortly after the blaze, with a police team now in Thailand to take them into custody upon their return.

Saksham Tate was murdered by his girlfriend Aanchal Mamidwar's family, who opposed their relationship. Despite arrests, the law lacks a specific 'honour killing' category, leaving a legal and social vacuum. This deeply rooted societal issue continues to claim lives, demanding a significant cultural shift.

Amazon layoffs: VP explains 14,000 jobs cuts; Done to remove organisational layers
description: Amazon's senior vice president Amit Agarwal stated that recent layoffs are aimed at removing organizational layers to foster agility, enabling the company to operate like a startup in an AI-driven world. CEO Andy Jassy clarified the cuts are culture-driven, not financially or AI-driven, to streamline operations and empower employees.

title: Bangladesh to hold first general elections since Sheikh Hasina’s ouster in 2024, announces date
Kiku Sharda reveals the Kapil Sharma Show guest who refused to follow script; won’t wait for joke’s punchline: ‘Kaisi baat kar raha hai’
No relief for Goa club owners: Court denies interim bail; Thailand to deport Luthras soon
description: Delhi court denied transit anticipatory bail to Saurabh and Gaurav Luthras, owners of the Goa nightclub where a fatal fire occurred. The brothers sought protection to avoid immediate arrest upon returning from Thailand. Goa's counsel argued they were evading legal process, while the defense emphasized their willingness to cooperate with the investigation.

title: CBI cracks Rs 1000cr crypto scam: 2 Chinese nationals, 150 shell accounts exposed
description: CBI has charged 30 individuals, including two Chinese nationals, in a massive Rs 1,000-crore crypto-investment scam.  The accused allegedly used a fake app, 'HPZ Tokens', to dupe investors with promises of huge returns on non-existent bitcoin-mining machines.  This sophisticated cyber-crime network, operated from abroad, exploited India's payment aggregation system to launder funds.

title: Six months after Congress frowned on a Vantara-Delhi Zoo deal, quiet entry of a Telangana MoU
Hockey: Hyderabad named as host of World Cup 2026 qualifiers featuring Indian women’s team
‘Act on Salman Khan’s suit on personality rights protection within 3 days ‘: Delhi HC to social media platforms
Taliban, TTP & Balochistan: The three-body problem facing Pak - explained
Chaos in Pakistan: Punches, kicks fly; referee assaulted - Watch
description: Chaos erupted after a National Games football semi-final in Karachi, with Pakistan Army and WAPDA players and officials involved in a violent brawl.  The altercation, captured on live broadcast and social media, saw punches and kicks exchanged.  Frustration over a penalty kick reportedly fueled the post-match aggression, leading to injuries and a pursuit of the referee.

title: The Devil movie review: Challenging Star Darshan returns with an archaic, problematic extravaganza
No white-topping for Bengaluru’s MG Road; BWSSB to dig it up for fresh water, sewage lines
Warning to tech giants: US attorneys general asks about chatbots; want audits
description: State attorneys general have warned 13 major tech companies, including Microsoft and Google, about the "delusional outputs" of AI chatbots. They argue these "dark patterns" pose mental health risks and violate state laws, citing incidents of murder-suicides and child exploitation. The officials demand independent audits and regulatory review of AI products.

title: Split coaching: Ex-captain responds after Gambhir's 'stick to domain' remark
description: Kapil Dev dismissed the idea of split coaches for Indian cricket following their Test series loss to South Africa. He emphasized that the BCCI should adopt the system best suited for Indian cricket. Dev also commented on the unchanging nature of sporting challenges and player priorities regarding T20 leagues versus national duty.

description: Bangladesh's foreign affairs adviser stated it's strategically possible for Dhaka to join a regional grouping with Pakistan, excluding India, following Islamabad's signals for a trilateral initiative with China. He also noted progress on lifting US sanctions on RAB and dismissed the likelihood of further sanctions on Bangladeshi leaders.

Sex, lies, video: How 100-member spy-cam gang targeted Delhi cops
description: A sophisticated crime syndicate in Delhi used hidden cameras in commercial vehicles to record traffic police, then doctored footage for blackmail and extortion. The gang, led by Raju Meena and Jeeshan Ali, also lodged false corruption complaints against targeted officers and even demanded sexual favors from female personnel, causing significant distress and forcing transfers.

title: Truck falls into gorge: 22 feared dead; authorities alerted when survivor emerges after 72hrs
description: Tragedy struck in Arunachal Pradesh as at least 22 Assam labourers are feared dead after their mini truck plunged into a deep gorge near the Indo-China border. A lone survivor, severely injured, alerted authorities after a perilous journey. Rescue operations are underway, with specialized teams and the Army working to retrieve bodies from the treacherous terrain.

title: Umar Khalid gets 2 weeks interim bail to attend sister’s wedding
Delhi riots case: Umar Khalid gets interim bail; why court gave relief
description: A Delhi court has granted interim bail to former JNU student leader Umar Khalid from December 16 to 29. This temporary relief allows him to attend his sister's wedding. Khalid, arrested under UAPA in the Delhi riots conspiracy case, will return to custody after the permitted period.

description: Prada is collaborating with Indian artisans for a limited-edition sandal collection, following criticism for designs resembling traditional Kolhapuri chappals.  The luxury brand will produce 2,000 pairs in Maharashtra and Karnataka, blending Indian craftsmanship with Italian techniques. This initiative aims to elevate global recognition for the craft and ensure fair compensation for artisans.

title: Russian woman cleans up trash on Uttarakhand trek, urges travellers to respect the Himalayas: ‘Really upsetting sight for a sacred place’
Pakistan’s central bank receives $1.2 billion from IMF for climate resilience
IGPL tour: Pranavi creates history; first Indian woman to win professional golf title against men
description: Pranavi Urs made history at the IGPL Invitational Mumbai, becoming the first Indian woman to win a professional golf event in an open field against men. Shooting a bogey-free 8-under 60, she overtook overnight leader Karandeep Kochhar to claim the title. Her breakthrough highlights the growing strength of women’s golf in India and challenges longstanding gender norms in sport.

description: Former India batter Robin Uthappa expressed surprise at head coach Gautam Gambhir not mentioning Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's stellar performances after India's ODI series win.  Despite their significant contributions, Uthappa found Gambhir's silence unusual, especially given the senior players' consistent form. He added that both senior players delivered strong performances.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Luthra brothers misled police - what cops told court
description: Goa police informed a Delhi court that nightclub co-owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra misled investigators and showed no cooperation after the deadly fire that killed 25. The brothers, who fled to Thailand, are seeking anticipatory bail, but police argue their actions disentitle them to such protection. The investigation into the blaze continues.

description: Abhishek Sharma's rapid rise to international cricket is attributed to his rigorous childhood training and the strict mentorship of Yuvraj Singh. His father and coaches recall his dedication from a young age, with Yuvraj's tough love continuing to shape his game, even influencing his adoption of golf to refine his batting.

Goa fire fallout: Thailand treaty & how Luthras will be sent back — deportation playbook
description: Co-owners of the 'Birch by Romeo Lane' nightclub, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, are set to be extradited to India from Thailand after fleeing following a fire that claimed 25 lives. Detained in Phuket, their extradition highlights the India-Thailand Extradition Treaty, which facilitates the surrender of fugitive offenders.

title: 'Under pressure, hands trembling': Rahul takes dig at Shah over Lok Sabha speech — watch
description: Rahul Gandhi accused Home Minister Amit Shah of appearing nervous and using foul language during his Lok Sabha speech on electoral reforms. Gandhi challenged Shah to a debate on his press conference allegations, but Shah stated Parliament would not function according to Gandhi's wishes.

title: Sherrone Moore scandal: Detention, alleged affair and scrutiny on wife Kelli
description: The Sherrone Moore scandal escalated as Michigan fired him for cause after an inappropriate relationship with a staff member and police later detained him in Saline. The fallout includes scrutiny of his wife, speculation around staffer involvement, and Michigan naming Biff Poggi interim head coach while law enforcement reviews potential charges amid Paige Shiver pregnancy rumors.

title: Paige Shiver’s net worth: 55% salary hike and link to Sherrone Moore scandal fuel speculation
description: University of Michigan football is in turmoil as executive assistant Paige Shiver faces intense public scrutiny. Her name is linked to former coach Sherrone Moore's firing and police detainment due to alleged inappropriate relationship rumors. Shiver's recent significant salary increase and social media silence have fueled speculation amid the ongoing investigation.

title: Candace Owens hits back as Erika Kirk urges public to stop Charlie Kirk rumors
description: Erika Kirk pleaded for privacy regarding her husband Charlie Kirk's burial site on Fox News, citing fears of grave desecration. However, Candace Owens interpreted this plea as a veiled attack, claiming Kirk's words were directed at her. Owens continues to promote unverified theories about Kirk's assassination, despite official reports pointing to a lone gunman.

title: Stefon Diggs reacts to Cardi B’s bold green bob and leather look on Miami night out
description: Cardi B and Stefon Diggs are solidifying their status as a prominent NFL power couple, recently showcasing their public affection during a Miami girls' night. Diggs' viral comment on Cardi's vibrant green bob and stylish outfit highlighted their growing comfort in sharing intimate moments online, reinforcing their strong connection amid recent celebrations and new beginnings.

title: Money mistakes: Kevin O’Leary warns consumers; the biggest financial trap people fall into unnoticed
description: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary warns homebuyers against purchasing oversized properties, calling it a significant financial pitfall. He advises keeping mortgage payments under a third of after-tax income to avoid becoming 'house poor.' O'Leary advocates for a staged approach, starting with a smaller home and upgrading later as finances strengthen, especially with current high mortgage rates.

title: Venus Williams & Andrea Preti net worth 2025: Career, family & business
description: Venus Williams boasts an estimated $95 million net worth in 2025, primarily from her legendary tennis career and successful fashion and design businesses. Her partner, Andrea Preti, an actor and businessman, contributes an estimated $1-2 million. Together, their combined net worth is approximately $96-97 million, reflecting their individual financial achievements.
